original_text: His offering was one silver plate weighing a hundred and thirty shekels and one silver sprinkling bowl weighing seventy shekels, both according to the sanctuary shekel, each filled with the finest flour mixed with olive oil as a grain offering;
korean_text: 그의 헌물도 성소의 세겔로 백삼십 세겔 무게의 은 쟁반 하나와 칠십 세겔 무게의 은 바리 하나라 이 두 그릇에는 소제물로 기름 섞은 고운 가루를 채웠고

sentences.original_text: His offering was one silver plate
weighing a hundred and thirty shekels
both according to the sanctuary shekel
sentences.korean_translation: 둘 다 성소의 세겔에 따른 것이었다

sentences.original_text: each filled with the finest flour
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 최상의 고운 가루로 채워져 있었고
